findings: Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of left lower lobe.
Collapse of left lower lobe lobe with volume loss.
Fibrotic changes with honeycombing in left lower lobe.
Thoracic aortic aneurysm measuring 28 mm in diameter.
Mediastinal widening observed with soft tissue density.
recommendations: Immediate intervention may be required depending on severity.
